attributes.review: Took 73 hours to download and took up all of my storage. Now keep in mind, I have the newest iphone with the best storage plan, and this app RUINED it. I didnâ€™t mind at first because I wanted to know more about Trumps policies but almost seconds after signing on to the app, I got a bunch of notifications that my information was being stolen. I wasnâ€™t worried about this until a few hours after downloading the app my doorbell rang and when I answered it Trump was standing there and body slammed me to the ground. My elderly mother then came in to check on what was making all the noise and he tackled her onto a table breaking the table in the process. I thought this was a little unprofessional, but nobody is perfect so I went with it. Unfortunately he then bit off my ears, nose, and toes. Donâ€™t think I can support this app now

attributes.review: I downloaded this app a few days ago to see what Trump supporters look at for their information and to see what information Trump puts out for his supporters. I am a politically curiously person, and while I donâ€™t support Trump in any way, I do like to view information from every source possible. When I put in my email I specifically unchecked the one box so that I would not receive any texts or emails from his administration. However I am now receiving both texts and emails- and I never even gave them my phone number. Creepy! Also not to mention, about 1/2 of the time that I try to use the app on my iPhone 8 it crashes. So overall this app was a waste of my effort as I can hardly use it and it somehow has access to information I never allowed it access to.
attributes.title: Horrible and steals information
